title: Jitsuroku - Adachi Mitsuru Monogatari
description: This is the tale of how Adachi Mitsuru went from being an assistant artist on a weekly manga to the superstar manga-ka we know him to be today (including writing and drawing the award winning [url=https://mangadex.org/title/1281]Touch[/url] and [url=https://mangadex.org/title/991]Cross Game[/url]). But it’s told (and written by) Mitsuru’s older brother Tsutomu, who was also an assistant artist early on in their careers…
